head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOPP, JOHN J., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOPP, JOHN J., JR.

block.p: BOPP-John J., Jr. Sr. VP of Salomon Smith-Barney, of NYC and Mattituck, on May 5, 2000. Beloved husband of Megumi Kimura. Loving son of Marian and John J. Bopp. Dear brother of Joseph, David and Robert. Reposing at the William F. Coster Funeral Home, Main Rd, Rt. 25, Cutchogue, NY, Sunday, 7 PM to 9 PM, and Monday, 2 PM to 4 PM, and 7 PM to 9 PM. Mass of the Resurrection, Tuesday, 11 AM, at Our Lady of Good Counsel Church, Main Rd, Mattituck. In lieu of flowers, masses or donations to Memorial Sloan-Kettering preferred.
